__e: Now I see how much I regret having done this... because my mother is doing everything on her own... and she has run up a lot of debts because of me.
My mother went into debt for me.
So, the night of the 15th, you were honest with her about your debts for the first time?
Yeah, I paid my dues and then some in this motherfucker.
But as far as now, I still have a bunch of student loans and things like that, so...
Okay, all I'm trying to do is to cover his debts and leave his family with a little something.
It would've bought a lot more if you hadn't lost half of them to pay off your gambling debts.
Besides, I don't know if you know, but she's got gambling debts.
It's the little things, really... the gambling debts, the other men, the other women, the older men, the younger women.
Is it true he was in debt to your husband and you were the payment?
He brought the money I just gave you to pay off my son's debt.
Besides, I don't know if you know, but she's got gambling debts.
You know, everyone's in terrible debt like us, I'm certain.
Talking about owing, owing is idiotic.
I have debt to repay, what can I do?
You know, everyone's in terrible debt like us, I'm certain.
Some of these people owed me from before.
I owe you a life debt... and I don't like being indebted to anyone.
and so is you who will in turn to get the debts with the mouth.
"Wow, I feel really bad because of all this debt I've got."
'Cause the story that I heard, was that when your old man croaked a year ago, that he left more debt than dollars.
